column5: Great video!
Thanks folks....some very kind words from everyone. We are very lucky to live where we do....can't think of a better p[lace to raise our boy.
He might just be the next Al Lindner!Thanks for sharing this awesome video.
That was great for both father and son.
Thanks for sharing. What an awesome evening for the family.
Love the hat... I smiled the whole time watching this video... Thanks for sharing
Love that video!
I'm grinning ear to ear after watching this. Another great video man!
Awesome awesome awesome!!! Very touching to the heart.
Excellent Simon!
Great video .Looks like you have a life long fishing partner now !!!! ;-)Brought back many memories of my early fishing trips with my children ..Thanks for sharing ..
priceless

This is tremendous. This is what it's all about, passing it on. The minnow bucket was classic (I might have to use that sometime for myself)! In the not so distant future, 'One More Cast' may soon be posting. Thanks for sharing.

Hi all,Could not have been prouder than I was last night. After pretty much ignoring my poor son the whole day doing en suite renos, at around 6pm my boy pipes up "Dad....lets eat supper in the bye boat at ..........Lake" ( I love that he knows the names of the individual lakes). Mum comes home and I run it by her, she's a good sport, so off we went.So far Jack has shown little interest in fishing. He loves being in the boat but despite my efforts to get him fishing he usually finds other stuff of interest. Last night however it was all about catching fish. At the end he states "Just one more cast"....job done for now!VIDEO OF JACK PUTTING PRESSURE ON THE NWO WALLEYE POPULATIONhttp://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CQ1G7x1fMUEhttp://i907.photobucket.com/albums/a...j/IMG_2525.jpg
classic!
That is awesome. Thanks for sharing.
Great video.......a real trooper, fishing until dark. Reminds me of my younger days. My parents would be setting up camp.....I'd have a half dozen fish from the bank. Thanks for sharing
That is definitely awesome! A job well done. Enjoy his company for many years to come!
Best fishing video I have seen in a long time.
Great memories! "I'm just washing him off cuz he's kinda dirty"....Hahahahaha...too funny!Juls
"Daddy, may i have one more cast please?" I will be smiling all day! Thanks for sharing this.
...agreed! Well done Simon!
I'm just glad you allowed him to use your good rod and reel. Great video!
